mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NAME , TO_CHAR(W.HIREDATE,'YYYY')||'년 ' ||TO_CHAR(W.HIREDATE, 'MON')||TO_CHAR(W.HIREDATE,'DD')||'일' HIREDATE , W.OCCUPATION , W.EMPLOYMENT_TYPE , P.POSITION , E.ADDRESS , E.DETAIL_ADDRESS , T.DEPT_NAME FROM EMP E , WORK_INFO W , DEPT T , POSITION P WHERE E.EMP_CODE=W.EMP_CODE AND E.DEPT_CODE=T.DEPT_CODE AND E.POSITION_CODE=P.POSITION_CODE AND E.EMP_CODE = #{empCode}
